participant_2.background:
I used to live in a small town in the Midwest.
i have trouble getting along with family.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
i enjoy playing computer games.

content.text: Hello, I'm from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read.
Hi! I used to live in a small town in the Midwest. What do you like to read?
Mostly fantasy novels, like Lord of the Rings or Harry Potter.
I like those too! Have you read the Witcher series?
I haven't, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really good! It's about a Witcher, a professional monster hunter.
That sounds interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! I think you'd like it.
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch nature documentaries, and sing lullabies to my baby.
Lullabies sound relaxing. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like all sorts of games, but I'm really into role-playing games right now.
Me too! I love getting lost in another world.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and escape from reality.
I agree! What's your favorite video game of all time?
That's a tough question! I think I'd have to say The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
That's a classic! I love that game too.
Me too! It's so much fun.
What's your favorite part about it?
I love the exploration and the sense of adventure.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore the world and find new things.
I agree! It's a great game.
It is! I'm glad we agree.
Me too
